This Registration Agreement comprises of HiTalk Software User Agreement, appendixes thereof, and use agreement and license terms of third\-party authorized software or technologies. 
	 You must read and accept all of the terms in this Agreement. Your download, installation, and use of the software, registration and login shall be regarded as your acceptance of the Agreement and your agreement to be bound by all the terms and conditions of this Agreement. 
	 1 HiTalk Team reserves the right to modify this Agreement and terms in appendixes thereof. After HiTalk Team has modified the clauses of Agreement, you shall stop using software or services provided by HiTalk Team if you do not agree with the modified clauses. Otherwise, it will be deemed that you have accepted the clauses amended. 
	 2 To use more functions provided by the HiTalk service, you shall provide accurate and authentic information when registering the HiTalk service and share use the service only for legal purposes. 
	 3 If you install and use HiTalk software, you are deemed to allow the software to analyze your mobile address book to find your friends using HiTalk. Your address book will only be used to rapidly find friends and HiTalk Team will take all reasonable measures to protect your information and privacy. 
	 4 If your mobile number or email address bound with your HiTalk account is changed, cancel the binding relationship immediately. If you does not do so, HiTalk Team will not bear legal responsibility for any loss. 
	 5 HiTalk Team reserves the right to replace, modify, or upgrade HiTalk software at any time, including modifying or limiting some software functions based on market requirements. HiTalk Team does not promise the availability of the previous version after releasing a new version. 
	 6 HiTalk Team and partner companies reserve the right to charge value-added services and amend or change tariffs. Involved users will be properly notified of any changes and can choose to continue or stop using the services. 
	 7 HiTalk Team has the right to place advertisements in pop-up windows or system messages on the HiTalk website or client during service provisioning. 
	 8 The HiTalk service is free of any service charge now, but your network carrier may charge you a fee for using the service in scenarios including but not limited to the following: 
- Log in to HiTalk mobile client or go to HiTalk WAP pages. 
- Click links on HiTalk service pages or in sessions and redirect to a third-party website or platform. 
- Click links on HiTalk service pages or in sessions to open pictures or watch videos on a third-party website or platform. 
- Other operations for using services proved by a third-party website or platform. 
- Make calls (including VoIP calls) through the HiTalk client. 
		 8.1 You can decide whether to use content, functions, or services that may cost you money. 
		 8.2 Specific tariffs are decided and collected by your network carrier according to local standards. 
	 9 You are not allowed to use the HiTalk software to perform activities including but not limited to the following: 
		 9.1 Post, upload, transmit, disseminate, or store defamatory, harassing, malicious, grossly offensive, and obscene content or content that disobeys national laws and regulations, endangers national security and unity, and disturbs social order or jeopardize social stability. 
		 9.2 Publish, upload, transmit, disseminate, or store content that infringes another's intellectual property and other legal rights. 
		 9.3 Publish, distribute, and circulate authorized advertising and junk information. 
		 9.4 Participate in activities that threaten network security. 
		 9.5 Use third-party software, systems, or add-ins that are not developed, authorized, or approved by HiTalk Team or use cheating programs to access or use the HiTalk service. 
		 9.6 Perform activities against national laws and regulations, and activities that HiTalk Team considers to be indecent due to their illegal purpose, damage on others' legal interests, unauthorized usage. 
		 9.7 If a user breaches the foresaid stipulations, HiTalk Team has the right to terminate, suspend in part or in whole, or restrict the functions of the user's account. 
	 10 Disclaimer: HiTalk Team has no responsibility or liability for loss when you use the HiTalk software in the following scenarios: 
		 10.1 Personal information is disclosed due to your misoperation. 
		 10.2 Services are interrupted or blocked due to a third-party's communication error, technical problem, network or computer failure, system instability, hacker attacks, computer viruses, or government regulation. 
		 10.3 Users suffer psychological or physical damage, and economic loss from being misled or deceived when communicating with other HiTalk users. 
	 11 Laws and regulations of People's Republic of China are the governing law for the interpretation of, validity of, and settlement of disputes arising from this Agreement. When any dispute or controversy arises between HiTalk Team and a user, the two parties shall be resolved in the court located in the jurisdiction where HiTalk Team resides.
